title: PayPax
author: PayPax
content: PayPax focuses on making digital currencies exchange easy for users all around the globe. You can send, receive, exchange and accept more than 50 cryptocurrencies and various types of e-money including paypal, perfect money, webmoney, payeer, etc.Main PayPax advantages that makes it an ideal platform:1. For exchanging, deposit and withdrawals account verification is not needed and you can make immediate exchanges 24/7. 2. Deposit/withdrawal fees are low.3.exchange rates are competitive and no hidden fees are included.4. All operations of deposit and withdrawals in addition to exchange orders are fully automated.  5. Mobile version to easy trade direct from mobile device6. High level of security for users' wallets and accounts is performed. 7. Easy-to-use API for payment gateway. 8. Customer support is available at any time to answer users’ questions.9. PayPal, perfect money, webmoney, and payeer exchange is available.10. More than 50 types of crypto and digital currencies are supported. Visit our website for more info: https://paypax.io/en

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: According to your privacy policy and AML policy, you can collect any customer data at your will but what's not good is most of the information about your company is redacted according to whois? Don't you think it would be fair if you were transparent from your side as well

comments.author: PayPax
comments.created_time: September 19, 2022, 05:23:07 AMLast edit: September 19, 2022, 05:45:57 AM by PayPax
comments.body: We use whois guard for security concerns and to protect the website against hackers and attacks, that is why the information is redacted. However, you can access our information in the about us section on paypax.io. In order to gain more satisfaction and trust from users like you, we will refer your feedback to the security department to provide users with the information of the domain owner while maintaining security through alternative solutions. It worth noting that many popular exchanges such as FTX.com use whois guard to protect website and this does not mean that the business activity is not transparent. It would be a great pleasure if you share your feedback or questions about any of our services since we are here to answer.
